mdRecord.dcterms:description: Random observations, rap song lyric and statements of despair. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
What has UVA taught you? | My best isn't good enough | I AM DYING | West side 4 LYFE | On the west side it don't stop, no | LOL | well fuck me I guess
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Despair
Rap (Music)
